howItWorks.title: How It Works?
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple and secure in 3 steps
howItWorks.step1Text: Explore the categories and find the perfect experience or service for you.
howItWorks.step2Text: On the desired experience page, purchase the discount voucher. We process your payment securely.
howItWorks.step3Text: Your discount voucher will be sent **immediately via email**. Contact the partner for further details or visit the location with the voucher in hand and enjoy your experience! All instructions will be detailed in the email.
howItWorks.safetyNote: Your safety is our priority. All payments are processed by secure platforms. Keep your voucher safe.
